text: Unity in diversity" - that's what they always say, but let's be real, it's just a nice way of saying "we're all the same." But are we? Really? I don't think so. We have different cultures, beliefs, values, and that's what makes us unique. And yet, we're constantly being told to conform to some sort of artificial standard. No, thank you. I'll stick with my own identity, my own culture, and my own beliefs.
